publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-124 John Park: Council of Economic Advisers Representation—That the Parliament supports the important role that constructive industrial relations plays in improving workplace productivity and competitiveness; welcomes the central role that trade unions in partnership with employers can play in ensuring world-class employment standards; recognises the strategic input of trade unions in economic matters in countries such as Ireland, Norway, Denmark and Sweden; believes that trade unions bring expertise and balance to economic debate, and calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure there is a workplace perspective in the shape of trade union representation in the proposed council of economic advisers or any similar body advising government.
S3M-124 Council of Economic Advisers Representation (lodged on 5 June 2007) Malcolm Chisholm*, Margo MacDonald*
S3M-124 Council of Economic Advisers Representation (lodged on 5 June 2007) Duncan McNeil*

S3M-124 John Park: Council of Economic Advisers Representation—That the Parliament supports the important role that constructive industrial relations plays in improving workplace productivity and competitiveness; welcomes the central role that trade unions in partnership with employers can play in ensuring world-class employment standards; recognises the strategic input of trade unions in economic matters in countries such as Ireland, Norway, Denmark and Sweden; believes that trade unions bring expertise and balance to economic debate, and calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure there is a workplace perspective in the shape of trade union representation in the proposed council of economic advisers or any similar body advising government. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm, Margo MacDonald, Duncan McNeil, Elaine Murray*, Trish Godman*, Mary Mulligan*, Elaine Smith*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, David Whitton*, Jackie Baillie*, George Foulkes*, Bill Wilson*, Hugh Henry*, Paul Martin*, Bill Butler*, Cathie Craigie*, Pauline McNeill*, Marlyn Glen*, Charlie Gordon*, Des McNulty*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Michael McMahon*
S3M-124 Council of Economic Advisers Representation (lodged on 5 June 2007) Andy Kerr*, Alex Neil*
S3M-124 Council of Economic Advisers Representation (lodged on 5 June 2007) Sarah Boyack*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-124 Council of Economic Advisers Representation (lodged on 5 June 2007) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-124 Council of Economic Advisers Representation (lodged on 5 June 2007) Claire Baker*
S3M-124 Council of Economic Advisers Representation (lodged on 5 June 2007) Richard Baker*
